ABB chairman sees limited impact from Red Sea disruptionsSwiss engineering group ABB sees limited impact from disruptions in the Red Sea on its supply chains, Chairman Peter Voser said in an interview on Monday ahead of the World Economic Forum's (WEF) annual meeting in Davos. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 20:24:24 GMT M5FOUGRJ7BK7XPBJVPEU5IKSXQ https://www.reuters.com/business/abb-chairman-sees-limited-impact-red-sea-disruptions-2024-01-15/Divya Chowdhury, Savio Shetty商业达沃斯
AstraZeneca says no supply snags so far from Red Sea disruptionsDrugmaker AstraZeneca has not seen any supply issues so far due to Red Sea shipping disruptions, a top executive told Reuters ahead of the World Economic Forum (WEF) on Monday. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 17:37:50 GMT W3SH5WHIMNMA3KBQSKANTEL35U https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/astrazeneca-says-no-supply-snags-so-far-red-sea-disruptions-2024-01-15/Divya Chowdhury, Savio Shetty商业达沃斯
Switzerland to host Ukraine peace summit at Zelenskiy's requestSwitzerland on Monday agreed to host a global peace summit on Ukraine at the request of Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 17:12:44 GMT MVD4YYSMPRLTBJG36QVVELGEYE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-zelenskiy-wants-china-join-global-peace-summit-2024-01-15/John Revill世界欧洲
What to expect in 2024: Fed pivot, cooling inflation, easing growthGlobal growth will likely slow this year, but a dovish tilt in the Federal Reserve's stance has raised hopes for the U.S. economy and brightened the outlook for riskier assets, according to big banks. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 16:07:46 GMT 76SUVTOLZJPTPFQPBWEWR3KWBA https://www.reuters.com/markets/what-expect-2024-fed-pivot-cooling-inflation-easing-growth-2024-01-15/Reuters市场
Davos 2024: India on cusp of FDI flood, Bajaj Finserv CEO saysBy Una Galani and Antoni Slodkowski Mon, 15 Jan 2024 14:45:27 GMT 666JP5R25BOAJBPHUVQCW75WDI https://www.reuters.com/world/india/india-cusp-fdi-flood-bajaj-finserv-chair-says-davos-2024-01-15/Reuters世界印度
Georgia's ruling party leader visits China in push for deeper tiesThe leader of Georgia's ruling party began a six-day visit to China on Monday, as the European Union candidate member country seeks to deepen its relations with Beijing, Georgian media reported. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 14:36:05 GMT KQQ7LD62MZLITIGCAGJJMBW3NQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/georgias-ruling-party-leader-visits-china-push-deeper-ties-2024-01-15/Felix Light世界中国
